info.description:
This API allows recording of waste data.

The base endpoint URL for this API in production is: `https://marko.aramark.net/i1/food_production`.

For testing the API with the "Try" tool on this page or in your app, use either our testing server "qa-marko" or our development server "dev-marko".
info.title: Waste

post.description:
Log food waste by service area.

![This endpoint is in prod](/themes/portal/images/statuspngs/statusprod.png)

requestBody.description: Details of the waste value being recorded

apiKeyAuth.name: apikey
apiKeyAuth.description: This HTTP Header variable will verify permissions.

waste_id.description: Unique ID for the waste recording

waste_value.description: Numeric value of the waste recorded

sub_location_id.description: Unique ID for the Sub Location

service_area_id.description: Unique ID for the Service Area

waste_type.description: Area from which the waste was produced

measurement_unit.description: Unit of Measure of the weight

date_time.description: Date and time the waste was recorded MM/DD/YYYY 24HH:MI:SS
